git_status.last_commit: 3809d9f - T027: Static Analysis Orchestration validated + prompt path updates (6 hours ago)

work_context.current_task: T028-T030: SigNoz Deployment, OTel Instrumentation, Load Testing Framework
work_context.next_tasks: T031: Runtime Analysis Orchestration using Microsoft Agent Framework
work_context.notes: Completed 3 major runtime analysis components: (1) SigNoz deployer with live/mock modes and <1% overhead validation, (2) OTel instrumentation templates generating 9 artifacts for Java agent and manual Spring Boot integration, (3) Synthetic load testing framework with 4 patterns (constant/stepped/spike/wave) and statistical analysis. Added aiohttp>=3.9.0 dependency following reproducibility standards. All infrastructure services operational (PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, Redis, MinIO, Kafka). SigNoz OTel Collector running on ports 4317/4318.

Provide intelligent automation through agentic systems
Establish best practices for microservices decomposition
Enable practical implementation with real-world tools
